Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: History | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)

Felicity Kendal discovers India’s long love affair with Shakespeare - from the first days of Empire to Bollywood and beyond.

The film takes viewers on a visually spectacular journey to some of India’s most iconic cities as well as its rural heartland. Through a compelling blend of history, art and travelogue the film brings to life a great untold story of India’s enduring passion for the work of Britain’s greatest writer. (Source: BBC)

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31575)
